channel.title: Help me fix this!
channel.description: Ok Guys I Have A Problem With My Server, When I Am Loged Into The Server I Can Do Anything Just Like Playing Normaly But, When I Try To Logout It Takes 10 Sec.. Then It Will Not Let Me Login Unless I Restart The Source... And It Gives Me All These Errors.. Here Is A Youtube Video If You Want To See The Error's.. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iZGIPlmNSJw&feature=mfu_in_order&playnext=1&videos=Pojdsd7wW8M

item.title: Help me fix this!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Perses Pkers, post:6, topic:365284”][quote author=GabberDaan link=topic=461487.msg3375996#msg3375996 date=1287616629]
dude just a question. do you have the sql highscorethingy on your server?

cuz if you have it, some settings are wrong like the database to connect to, orrr you could have forget to put the mysql server online before starting your server

i’m not 100% sure that this is the problem but when i saw your vid on youtube i tought about this

(and if this is the problem, i don’t need the money that you offer. i’m here to help people for free)
[/quote]ok im not 100% sure on how to do this… and do you got teamviewer? (i Don’t got a scorebourd!)[/quote]

PM me your Teamviewer information, I can fix the problem quite easily.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me fix this!
item.dc:creator: @GabberDaan GabberDaan
item.description:
@GabberDaan wrote:

dude just a question. do you have the sql highscorethingy on your server?

cuz if you have it, some settings are wrong like the database to connect to, orrr you could have forget to put the mysql server online before starting your server

i’m not 100% sure that this is the problem but when i saw your vid on youtube i tought about this

(and if this is the problem, i don’t need the money that you offer. i’m here to help people for free)

Read full topic
